title: Compliance Dashboard
description: Monitor compliance status, SLA adherence, and deadline tracking across all cases
overview: The Compliance Dashboard provides a real-time view of your firm's compliance posture. Track statutory deadline adherence, SLA compliance, overdue items, and risk exposure. This is your early warning system for potential compliance issues.

keyFeatures.title: Deadline Overview
keyFeatures.description: At-a-glance view of upcoming and overdue statutory deadlines

keyFeatures.title: SLA Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Monitor service level agreement compliance for tasks and cases

keyFeatures.title: Risk Indicators
keyFeatures.description: Color-coded risk levels for cases approaching deadlines

keyFeatures.title: Team Performance
keyFeatures.description: Compliance metrics by team member and role

keyFeatures.title: Alert Configuration
keyFeatures.description: Customize alert thresholds and notification rules
